name: USALCO Dry Aluminum Sulfate (Iron Free Grade)
description: USALCO Dry Aluminum Sulfate (Iron Free Grade) is manufactured using a state-of-the-art process and high-quality raw materials, which ensures that the product meets the highest quality standards. USALCO also produces dry alum in various other grades (low-iron and FCC-grade) and in specialty granular sizes to satisfy even the most difficult applications. USALCO's dry alum is used in water treatment, colors and dyes, leather tanning, papermaking, and many other industrial applications. It meets the specifications of the American Water Works Association Standard B403-16 and complies with the requirements of NSF/ANSI/CAN 60: Drinking Water Treatment Chemicals - Health Effects at a maximum dosage of 150 mg/L.

Synonyms: Al2(SO4)3, Aluminum Sesquisulfate, Aluminum(III) sulfate, Dialuminium Trisulfate, Dialuminum Sulfate, Dialuminum Trisulfate, Sulfatodialuminium Disulfate, Sulfatodialuminum Disulfate
